title: Exxon and Chevron Rack Up Giant Profits
description: Exxon Mobil and Chevron reported another round of strong profits. But they face political fire over gasoline prices, even as they fear a new downturn.
dc:creator: Clifford Krauss
media:credit: Alex Welsh for The New York Times
media:description: The high commodity prices and record profits through much of the year have increased political pressure on oil companies to increase production.
